description: Triangular array T read by rows: T(n,0) = 1 for n >= 0; T(1,1) = 1; and for n >= 2, T(n,k) = T(n-1,k-1) + T(n-1,k) for k = 1,2,...,[(n+1)/2]; T(n,n/2 + 1) = T(n-1,n/2) if n is even.
formula: T(n, k) = binomial(n, k) - binomial(n, k-3). - Darko Marinov (marinov(AT)lcs.mit.edu), May 17 2001
author: _Clark Kimberling_
